name: 蕭景文
objective: 本課程討論十八世紀到二十世紀中葉，歐洲和美國之建築歷史與理論。課程梳理重要的建築思潮、建築理論、建築師或建築團體、相關的歷史事件，以及代表性的建築作品。內容以現代性為核心、建築為經緯，討論社會轉變、工業革命、戰爭災害、文學藝術、哲學思潮等因子對近代建築史發展的影響。
schedule:
Week 01 2/21:  Syllabus & Introduction
Week 02 2/28:  228 (no class)
Week 03 3/06:  Neoclassicism & Revivals
Week 04 3/13:  Industrialization & New Materials
Week 05 3/20:  Arts & Crafts Movement
Week 06 3/27:  Art Nouveau, Secession and Loos
Week 07 4/03:  The Chicago School & Skyscraper
Week 08 4/10:  Frank Lloyd Wright & Organic Architecture
Week 09 4/17:  Midtern Exam
Week 10 4/24:  The Werkbund and the Bauhaus
Week 11 5/01:  Avant-gardes: De Stijl, Furturism, Structuralism and Cubism
Week 12 5/08:  Expressionism and Crystal Dreams
Week 13 5/15:  Le Corbusier's Ideal Villas
Week 14 5/22:  Less is More: Mies Van der Rohe and His Legacy
Week 15 5/29:  Modernism in Welfare States: Alvar Aalto & Gunnar Asplund
Week 16 6/05:  Totalitarian Architecture: Guiseppe Terragni and Albert Speer
Week 17 6/12:  CIAM and Post War Modernism
Week 18 6/19:  Final Exam
